ID.Description: The ID of the row in the table

Domain.Description: The name of the domain that is being querried

Version.Description: The version of the rule for the specified domain

CreationDate.Description: The time at which the rule was added to the databse

MinLength.Description: The minimum length of a password generated for this domain

MaxLenght.Description: The maximum length of a password generated for this domain

RestrictedCharacters.Description: A list of characters that cannot be included in the password / a list of characters that can be used in the password

Regex.Description: A regular expression that must be matched to the generated password before it is displayed. If a hash does not match this an additional iteration of hashing occurs and this step is repeated

Parent.Description: The domain that has the same password as the one being looked up. EG: Youtube's parent is Google as they share a password while having different domains.
